title: N2O4 NO2 equil - enthalpy change and bond energy

content.question: Which of the following statements about ∆H° for the reaction is correct?

choices.label: ΔH° < 0 because energy is released when the N−N bond breaks.
ΔH° < 0 because energy is required to break the N−N bond.
ΔH° > 0 because energy is released when the N−N bond breaks.
ΔH° > 0 because energy is required to break the N−N bond.

content.answer: ΔH° > 0 because energy is required to break the N−N bond.
